vuln_b4536bee1e42f1e0edb800bb079ae5da2e6.description: This rule checks if FTP Server allows Anonymous Access
vuln_b4536bee1e42f1e0edb800bb079ae5da2e6.mitigation: FTP allows anonymous users access. Disable Anonymous FTP access if this is not a business requirement.

vuln_469c234702c55b39d83a3fdc05307f664f2.description: This rule checks for open Rare Ports
vuln_469c234702c55b39d83a3fdc05307f664f2.details: Server is listening on remote port: 6000 (x11)
vuln_469c234702c55b39d83a3fdc05307f664f2.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_c9c0963effaf46fdad755611e5025b104e5.description: This rule checks for open HTTP Ports
vuln_c9c0963effaf46fdad755611e5025b104e5.details: Server is listening on remote port: 80 (HTTP)
vuln_c9c0963effaf46fdad755611e5025b104e5.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_f99aa09884c3caf2470324a222a88490d57.description: This rule checks for open Remote Management Ports
vuln_f99aa09884c3caf2470324a222a88490d57.details: Server is listening on remote port: 23 (Telnet)
vuln_f99aa09884c3caf2470324a222a88490d57.mitigation: Bind all possible services to localhost, and confirm only those which require remote clients are allowed remotely.

vuln_95b234ce1e48b7cc3deb4775ac5bdef631d.description: This rule checks for open FTP Ports
vuln_95b234ce1e48b7cc3deb4775ac5bdef631d.details: Server is listening on remote port:21 (FTP)
vuln_95b234ce1e48b7cc3deb4775ac5bdef631d.mitigation: Ensure at the bare minimum FTP is over SSL, and only allow trusted clients to connect to it over the network.

vuln_d6b10c6bd9649e1be7e24c7accfe7128d79.description: This rule checks for misconfigurations in PHP
vuln_d6b10c6bd9649e1be7e24c7accfe7128d79.details: PHP Misconfiguration - Default PHP environment page at http://192.168.116.134:80/phpinfo.php
vuln_d6b10c6bd9649e1be7e24c7accfe7128d79.mitigation: The Remote Server's PHP is leaking out environment information, which may under certain situations reveal sensitive data such as environment variables, modules installed, etc. Disable PHP info by either adding `disable_functions = phpinfo` in php.ini file OR `php_value disable_functions phpinfo` in .htaccess file.

vuln_048da026db91057bb99442609bc5ea67b62.description: This rule checks for open Rare Ports
vuln_048da026db91057bb99442609bc5ea67b62.details: Server is listening on remote port: 2049 (nfs)
vuln_048da026db91057bb99442609bc5ea67b62.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_79472ecec848dfcde3fd0f00a4fc60e992f.description: This rule checks for open Remote Management Ports
vuln_79472ecec848dfcde3fd0f00a4fc60e992f.details: Server is listening on remote port: 139 (NetBIOS)
vuln_79472ecec848dfcde3fd0f00a4fc60e992f.mitigation: Bind all possible services to localhost, and confirm only those which require remote clients are allowed remotely.

vuln_b325d221aad7053caa33f95eaec424472b7.description: This rule checks for open Rare Ports
vuln_b325d221aad7053caa33f95eaec424472b7.details: Server is listening on remote port: 513 (login)
vuln_b325d221aad7053caa33f95eaec424472b7.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_bbe67554a1ba902687bc3d8f284b858baa8.description: This rule checks if OpenSSH allows passwords as an accepted authentication mechanism
vuln_bbe67554a1ba902687bc3d8f284b858baa8.details: Server accepts passwords as an authentication option
vuln_bbe67554a1ba902687bc3d8f284b858baa8.mitigation: OpenSSH allows password authentication, this is considered bad security practice. SSH Key based authentication should be enabled on the server, and passwords should be disabled.

vuln_0c8c2c9e0a8d6628f951da8e05fab3d9248.description: This rule checks for open Rare Ports
vuln_0c8c2c9e0a8d6628f951da8e05fab3d9248.details: Server is listening on remote port: 514 (shell)
vuln_0c8c2c9e0a8d6628f951da8e05fab3d9248.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_9fca01da6facf7ac6052aa92491bdbeecaf.description: This rule checks for the exposure of Web Panels
vuln_9fca01da6facf7ac6052aa92491bdbeecaf.mitigation: Identify whether the application in question is supposed to be exposed to the network.

vuln_033f661b192d519774f5052165fd30b7606.description: This rule checks for Open Directories via Directory Indexing
vuln_033f661b192d519774f5052165fd30b7606.confirm: Remote Server has Directory Indexing Enabled
vuln_033f661b192d519774f5052165fd30b7606.details: Identified an Open Directory at http://192.168.116.134/test/
vuln_033f661b192d519774f5052165fd30b7606.mitigation: Disable Directory Indexing on the server. Directory Indexing can allow access to files on the server to untrusted sources.

vuln_6287752823aa99fe9069d17069cb8c0f2ca.description: This rule checks if the Server's Response Headers Reveals Platform Version
vuln_6287752823aa99fe9069d17069cb8c0f2ca.mitigation: Disable Version Advertisement in the Web Server Configuration. in IIS: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3374831/in-iis-can-i-safely-remove-the-x-powered-by-asp-net-header in ASP.NET: https://doc.sitecore.com/developers/90/platform-administration-and-architecture/en/remove-header-information-from-responses-sent-by-your-website.html

vuln_60e5b94f95a098e31a93b97d34dc4df1535.description: This rule checks for open Service Ports
vuln_60e5b94f95a098e31a93b97d34dc4df1535.details: Server is listening on remote port: 111 (NFS)
vuln_60e5b94f95a098e31a93b97d34dc4df1535.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_b258488fd065daef6341798968c6975bd98.description: This rule checks for VNC services on obfuscated ports
vuln_b258488fd065daef6341798968c6975bd98.details: Server is hiding VNC behind remote port: 6000
vuln_b258488fd065daef6341798968c6975bd98.mitigation: VNC Running on non-standard ports is easy for attackers to find. While it doesn't do harm changing the standard port from (default) 5900-5904, check whether VNC can be disabled, or allow acces only from trusted IP addresses.

vuln_1f0e4da5c888dfdf9809647fe932599ff92.description: This rule checks for open Rare Ports
vuln_1f0e4da5c888dfdf9809647fe932599ff92.details: Server is listening on remote port: 8009 (Unknown)
vuln_1f0e4da5c888dfdf9809647fe932599ff92.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_e0cdb5fa39524efe750f77b326c53d1985b.description: This rule checks for open Database Ports
vuln_e0cdb5fa39524efe750f77b326c53d1985b.details: Server is listening on remote port: 5432 (PostgreSQL)
vuln_e0cdb5fa39524efe750f77b326c53d1985b.mitigation: Bind all possible database interfaces to localhost. If the database requires remote connections, allow only trusted source ip addresses.

vuln_fb2cb5173abe661cd466d39db76024b6565.description: This rule checks for open Database Ports
vuln_fb2cb5173abe661cd466d39db76024b6565.details: Server is listening on remote port: 3306 (MySQL)
vuln_fb2cb5173abe661cd466d39db76024b6565.mitigation: Bind all possible database interfaces to localhost. If the database requires remote connections, allow only trusted source ip addresses.

vuln_0829662f4ec7cdf2293f1b370b49a9de6a0.description: This rule checks for open SMB Ports
vuln_0829662f4ec7cdf2293f1b370b49a9de6a0.details: Server is listening on remote port: 445 (SMB)
vuln_0829662f4ec7cdf2293f1b370b49a9de6a0.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_377a58e55e9c2727f2c27bee35ac4fb06dd.description: This rule checks for the exposure of Web Panels
vuln_377a58e55e9c2727f2c27bee35ac4fb06dd.mitigation: Identify whether the application in question is supposed to be exposed to the network.

vuln_6d1288613a1f5333b4e17ac08832528fe49.details: Server is listening on remote port: 22 (SSH)
vuln_6d1288613a1f5333b4e17ac08832528fe49.mitigation: Bind all possible services to localhost, and confirm only those which require remote clients are allowed remotely.

vuln_26771cd9fa6c97b5daeb14dd3b337621d36.details: Server is listening on remote port: 2121 (iprop)
vuln_26771cd9fa6c97b5daeb14dd3b337621d36.mitigation: Bind all possible network services to localhost, and configure only those which require remote clients on an external interface.

vuln_654f27103684ff5518a842a99c708b0eab6.details: Server is listening on remote port: 5900 (VNC)
